Partner

We´re working on a partner program which will be rolled out soon. Our partner program is designed with the objective to expand our reach in supporting all of our users and customers in getting the most out of their appserver.io installations. The appserver.io partnership programs differentiate between two different sub-programs to cater to the specific needs of our partners:

  • Solution Partner Program
  • Technology Partner Program


Interessted? Just click here and fill out the form - we´ll contact you shortly
